data.value: Session full. The specified session does not have enough open slots for all the local gamers signed in to this machine.

data.name: SessionNotFound
data.value: Session not found. It may have ended, or there may be no network connectivity between the local machine and session host.

data.name: SessionNotHost
data.value: This method can only be called by the session host.

data.name: SessionNotJoinable
data.value: Session not joinable. You must wait for the host to return to the lobby before joining.

data.name: ShaderCodeSizeMustBeDword
data.value: Effect code must have a size that is a multiple of four bytes.

data.name: ShadersMustBeCompiled
data.value: Creating an effect requires that the shader code has been compiled.

data.name: ShowSignInPaneCountInvalid
data.value: The paneCount argument is invalid. The valid options for this parameter are 1, 2, and 4.

data.name: SimulateMarketplacePurchaseCancelString
data.value: No

data.name: SimulateMarketplacePurchaseOkString
data.value: Yes

data.name: SimulateMarketplacePurchaseString
data.value: SimulateMarketplacePurchaseString=Would you like to simulate purchasing the full version of this game?\n\nThis screen is an emulation provided for testing. Once your game is available on LIVE Marketplace, the Marketplace purchase page will appear here instead.

data.name: SimulateMarketplaceTitleString
data.value: Test Purchase

data.name: SkinnedEffectMaxBones
data.value: SkinnedEffect supports a maximum of {0} bones.

data.name: SkinnedEffectWeightsPerVertex
data.value: SkinnedEffect.WeightsPerVertex must be 1, 2, or 4.

data.name: SongPlaybackFailed
data.value: Song playback failed. Please verify that the song is not DRM protected. DRM protected songs are not supported for creator games.

data.name: StaleSearchResult
data.value: This session search result is no longer valid. NetworkSession.Find return data is only valid up until you create a NetworkSession or perform some other search.

data.name: StreamNotSeekable
data.value: The stream is required to be seekable.

data.name: StreamTooLong
data.value: The stream exceeds the maximum length of {0}.

data.name: StringCollectionInvalid
data.value: The argument is invalid. It must contain between 1 and {0} strings. The strings cannot be null or empty, and must be less than {1} characters long.

data.name: StringNullEmptyOrTooLong
data.value: This string cannot be null or empty, and must be less than {0} characters long.

data.name: StringTooLong
data.value: This string must be less than {0} characters long.

data.name: TitleNameNotNull
data.value: You must pass in a non-null title name.

data.name: TooManyOperations
data.value: The application is requesting more texture filtering operations than the device supports.

data.name: TooManyPendingAsyncOperations
data.value: The asynchronous operation (IAsyncResult) could not be performed. There are too many pending operations.

data.name: TooManyRegions
data.value: A maximum of 255 regions are allowed for this method.

data.name: TrialMode
data.value: This functionality is not available when the game is running in trial mode.

data.name: TrueSkillNotHost
data.value: TrueSkill score and team for non-ranked sessions can only be written by the host.

data.name: TypeReaderDuplicate
data.value: Error loading "{0}". ContentTypeReader {1} conflicts with existing handler {2} for type {3}.

data.name: TypeReaderInvalid
data.value: Error loading "{0}". Cannot instantiate ContentTypeReader {1}.

data.name: TypeReaderNotFound
data.value: Error loading "{0}". Cannot find ContentTypeReader {1}.

data.name: TypeReaderNotRegistered
data.value: Error loading "{0}". Cannot find ContentTypeReader for {1}.

data.name: UnexpectedError
data.value: An unexpected error has occurred.

data.name: UnknownError
data.value: An unknown error occcured.

data.name: VertexElementBadUsage
data.value: Invalid VertexDeclaration. Usage {0}{1} is out of range.

data.name: VertexElementOffsetNotMultipleFour
data.value: Invalid VertexDeclaration. Vertex stride and VertexElement.Offset must be multiples of four.

data.name: VertexElementOutsideStride
data.value: Invalid VertexDeclaration. Element {0}{1} does not fit within the specified vertex stride.

data.name: VertexElementsOverlap
data.value: Invalid VertexDeclaration. Elements {0}{1} and {2}{3} are overlapping.

data.name: VertexStrideTooSmall
data.value: The vertex stride is too small for the type of data requested. This is not allowed.

data.name: VertexTypeNotIVertexType
data.value: Invalid vertex type. {0} does not implement the IVertexType interface.

data.name: VertexTypeNotValueType
data.value: Invalid vertex type. {0} is not a value type.

data.name: VertexTypeNullDeclaration
data.value: Invalid vertex type. {0} returned a null VertexDeclaration.

data.name: VertexTypeWrongSize
data.value: Invalid vertex type. The size of {0} does not match the stride of its vertex declaration.

data.name: ViewportInvalid
data.value: The viewport is invalid. The viewport cannot be larger than or outside of the current render target bounds. The MinDepth and MaxDepth must be between 0 and 1.

data.name: VisualizationArrayTooSmall
data.value: Length of visualization data buffers must be at least {0}.

data.value: Failed to destroy the low-level voice.

data.name: WaveBankNotPrepared
